CustomField.description: Compares target numbers versus actual numbers and tells if target numbers have been reached.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Registered"), ISBLANK(Targeted_Registration__c), Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c >= Registered_Target__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Registered"), Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c >= Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Logged On"), Actual_Attended_Qualified__c >= Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Both"), Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c >= Registered_Target__c, Actual_Attended_Qualified__c >= Targeted_Registration__c ) ), "Target(s) Met", IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Registered"), ISBLANK(Targeted_Registration__c), Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c < Registered_Target__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Registered"), Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c < Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Logged On"), Actual_Attended_Qualified__c < Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Type__c,"Both"), OR( Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c < Registered_Target__c, Actual_Attended_Qualified__c < Targeted_Registration__c ) ) ), "Target(s) Not Met", "Check Target Criteria" ) )
CustomField.label: Event Target(s) Met
